tool_description: Analyzes energy consumption patterns for HVAC systems, calculating usage metrics, cost estimates, and identifying peak consumption periods across different time scales.

start_time.description: Analysis start time in ISO 8601 format

end_time.description: Analysis end time in ISO 8601 format

energy_rate.description: Energy cost per kWh for cost calculations

error_messages: Invalid time range: start_time must be before end_time with maximum 2 year range.
Meter not accessible: One or more meter_ids are not found or offline.
Invalid energy rate: energy_rate must be a positive number between 0.01 and 1.00.
Invalid baseline period: Use one of [same_period_last_year, last_month, none].
usage: Specify meter_ids, time range, and optionally energy_rate and baseline_period. Returns detailed consumption analysis with cost calculations and comparisons.

total_consumption.description: Total energy consumption in kWh for the period

total_cost.description: Estimated total cost based on energy_rate

baseline_comparison.description: Percentage change from baseline period (positive = increase)

consumption_pattern.description: Identified consumption pattern: steady, variable, peak_heavy
